name: poiseed

scripts.seed:restaurants: node index.mjs --ai --json --categories restaurant,cafe --out temp_restaurants.json && node ingest_pois.mjs --file temp_restaurants.json
scripts.seed:shopping: node index.mjs --ai --json --categories shopping,entertainment --out temp_shopping.json && node ingest_pois.mjs --file temp_shopping.json
scripts.seed:nightlife: node index.mjs --ai --json --categories bar,venue --out temp_nightlife.json && node ingest_pois.mjs --file temp_nightlife.json
scripts.seed:food: node index.mjs --ai --json --categories restaurant,cafe,bar --out temp_food.json && node ingest_pois.mjs --file temp_food.json

description: Intelligent POI collector with AI-powered categorization for location-based applications
